operation.name: InsertIgnore
operation.sql: INSERT IGNORE INTO saved_gifs (user_id, gif_id) VALUES (:user_id, :gif_id)

operation.name: SelectAll
operation.sql: SELECT gif_id FROM saved_gifs WHERE user_id = :user_id

operation.name: Delete
operation.sql: DELETE FROM saved_gifs WHERE user_id = :user_id AND gif_id = :gif_id
